title: Clustering for entries for better overview and performance
body_html:
Hi!

I created a little patch to cluster all entries in groups so that the performance and the overview is improved. It used leaflet.MarkerCluster by Danzel (github.com/danzel). For this change, I had to update Leaflet to 0.4.5.
I tested it with Fx 17.0.1 and Chromium Version 21.0.1180.89 on Fedora. The map is a lot faster now.

leaflet.MarketCluster is also licensed under MIT license, so there's no license conflict.

May be you can merge these changes into your repository.

% Updated leaflet to version 0.4.5 (compatibility)

  • leaflet.MarkerCluster from
    https://github.com/danzel/Leaflet.markercluster/
  • Changed initialization of markers for 0.4.5

body:
Hi!

I created a little patch to cluster all entries in groups so that the performance and the overview is improved. It used leaflet.MarkerCluster by Danzel (github.com/danzel). For this change, I had to update Leaflet to 0.4.5.
I tested it with Fx 17.0.1 and Chromium Version 21.0.1180.89 on Fedora. The map is a lot faster now.

leaflet.MarketCluster is also licensed under MIT license, so there's no license conflict.

May be you can merge these changes into your repository.

% Updated leaflet to version 0.4.5 (compatibility)
- leaflet.MarkerCluster from
  https://github.com/danzel/Leaflet.markercluster/
- Changed initialization of markers for 0.4.5
  ![Image of the clusters](http://imgur.com/eG5cB.png)
